fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Prize 28,093
fields.bodyText: Across 9 hermitage HER  ITAGE 10 (Hampstead) Heath heartacHE AT Home (hidden) 11,12 bedtime stories B(L)E(N)D/TIMES(by)/TORIES 13 apex (trivi)A/(hel)P/(m)E/(clima)X 14 rallycross LORRY CLASS (anag) 16 nitpick double def 17 well off FELLOW (anag) + F 19 you don’t say double/cryptic def 22 scar SC(hol)AR 24 tucks in double def 25 too slow TO  W 26 nooky N  Y 27 Leicester LIE(anag)/SECRET(anag) Down 1 the Blarney Stone cryptic def [kiss the Blarney Stone] 2 gradient GRA  NT 3 civic palindrome 4 bareback B(ikes)/ARE/BACK 5 weasel W(ith)/EASEL(stand) [Pop Goes the Weasel] 6 the occult (saf)E in CLOTH CUT (anag) 7 casino COINS (anag) round A 8 chests of drawers double/cryptic def 15 Simon says SO MANY (anag) in SIS 17 wear thin W  IN 18 osculate CLUES TO A (anag) 20 uncool U(niform) + COLON (:) (anag) 21 tingly (disgus)TINGLY 23 covet CO(mpany)/VET
